extendedInfo.description: ** Please try our new RTS game: Defense Commandhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.escmobile.defensecommand- Free to play - Training Missions- Much better graphics & game play- 26 missions to accomplish!- Skirmish Mode- Hours of fun- Infantries, war trikes, tanks, siege tanks, paralyzer tanks, missile turrets, oil refineries, war factories, barraks, land mines, oil barrels and much more! TRY NOW FOR FREE, YOU WON'T REGRET!https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.escmobile.defensecommand------------------------------------------DEFEND HOMELAND - OLD SCHOOL REAL TIME STRATEGY GAME------------------------------------------A 'real' Real Time Strategy(RTS) gameSelect your nation & rank(difficulty),defeat red units to accomplish missions- Infantries- Tanks- Turrets- Oil refineries- Land mines and more!- Skirmish mode!- 16 Missions- 13 Buildings- 8 Units

reviews.comment: NO INSTRUCTIONS. I\'m sure it would be fun if there were ANY instructions, or even if i could find them on the web. Spent 1 hour so far searching.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a decent game and like others mentioned it reminds me of C&C. Lower rating because it can\'t be put on SD. Some dev\'s just don\'t get it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OK but the second map is exactly the same missions. Stuck on Under Siege mission....help someone, its impossible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: Some of the crapest levels are the hardest ones so after a while if your stuck its tedious.And come on tanks should be able to run people over like on candc.Also crashes when closing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: You won\'t get a better stategy game on market for 59p x10.@nick build a oil refinery (3rd building in menu) near oil source to get more cash.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: wasn\'t expecting much from this tbh but it\'s actually awesome. classic C&C action. feels like a full pc game back in the day. nice amount of units and the skirmishes are very challenging to keep you playing a long time. best game i\'ve played on android by a distance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Base walls would be a nice touch
reviews.comment: Could be a top game hope the updates do come regular. Has lots of potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brings back memories. Command and Conquer style design great to kill time. Highly recommend to those who enjoy strategy gaming.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: Graphics were minimal, AI does nothing, no instructions (including no explaination of units), 2 maps, and no multiplayer.  The only thing positive were the smooth controls IMO.  Look somewhere else for a good rts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: U can\'t choosecountry. Rip off to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Plays like the OG command and conquer.... A+ from me wourld great on the epic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I bought this game after I beat free version why do I have to start the campaign over again...also wheres multiplayer? I can no longer find on market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The stop invaders should have more helicopters and more big attacks. It is strange how your tanks can be fired upon and never return fire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be bigger and better fun lil game though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A bit boring but..
reviews.comment: I am used to warfare incorporated which is probably the best mobile war game you can ever have the pleasure of playing. much room for improvment
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: a good step in the right direction. still needs refining.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work at all on my phone. It crashes immediately after the Esc Mobile screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Very basic rts game. Missing some fundamental aspects expected in any rts game that make it almost unplayable
reviews.author: Alex Stobie

reviews.comment: Needs some work. Fun though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Nothing like command and conquer. Not enough options, controls, or expanse.
reviews.author: A Google User
